Title: Logic Programming and Nonmonotonic Reasoning at Kentucky
Body: Date: Tuesday, 26-Nov-96 00:54:05 GMT Server: NCSA/1.3 MIME-version: 1.0 Content-type: text/html Logic Programming and Nonmonotonic Reasoning at Kentucky LPNMR AT KENTUCKY Logic programming and nonmonotonic reasoning (LPNMR) is an active research area in the Computer Science Department at the University of Kentucky.
